name: Monsters Cube: Ball Sort
description:
Try to arrange cubes in tubes until all cubes of the same color are in the same tube. A challenging yet relaxing game to train your brain!

The game has a total of 100 levels.

How to play :

• Touch any tube to move the cube from the top of one tube to another.

• The rule is that you can only move one cube on top of another if both cubes have the same color and the tube you want to move has enough space.

• Try not to get stuck - but don't worry, you can always start over at any time.

Thank you for watching and playing.
